author: Paul Kane
title: On Ukraine, Republicans are united on criticizing Biden, but not on how to counter Russian threat
description: On Ukraine, Republicans are united on criticizing Biden not on what should be done.
content: This divide has been on stark display over the last 24 hours as Russian President Vladimir Putins ordered incursion into Ukraine creates chaos in Eastern Europe and Republicans rally around the idea â€¦ [+8780 chars]
